summary: Adds a necklace to increase smithing by 80%, located in The Bee and Barb
descriptionHtml:
Place \"Ultimate smithing necklace.esp\" in the data folder and check the box in NMM or in the game launcher.

Descrption: Adds a necklace in the basement of The Bee and Barb that will increase your smithing by 80%, it\'s guarded by a master lock. Nothing special really, just something to get good dragon armour.

Feel free to complain if needed.
author: basscross64
